resources.string: Shows notification of how much data was cleaned daily.
The last Android Cleaner you will ever need with Google inspired material design made by D4rK to be more simplistic and easy to use!
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
By agreeing, you confirm that you would like a personalized ad experience.
I understand that I will still see ads, but they may not be as relevant to my interests.
Are you sure you want to leave the app?
Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
Download Auto Folder Cleaner to easily schedule automatic folder deletion.
Download Big File Cleaner to easily find and remove big files on your device.

Personalize Your Ad Experience

This app personalizes your advertising experience using AdMob. AdMob and its partners may collect and process personal data such as device identifiers, location data, and other demographic and interest data to provide advertising experience tailored to you. By consenting to this improved ad experience, you\'ll see ads that AdMob and its partners believe are more relevant to you. Learn more.
Download Duplicate File Cleaner to easily find and remove duplicate files on your device.
Select path and click CLEAN to delete all empty folders and subfolders!
Click the button SELECT and allow access to the folder you want to scan!

SAF (Storage Access Framework) is a new method of accessing the storage of your device. In future versions of Android (11 and higher) Google is blocking the old way and this is the only supported way for now. You can try it now. It\'s a bit slower but you gain folder picker, external storage support and future technology support.
Working… This may take some time…
UnderPenis69/UnderBenis96, Sonerie C8chilu\' dă Haur a.k.a Băiatu\' Pocnitoare (fostă petardă de elită pă vremea lu\' Ștefan cel Mare), Wiss Kill, YoYo, Auroșu Roșu.
Automatically runs daily, without you having to open the app.
Do you want to remove %d selected item(s) from MediaStore? This operation cannot be reverted.
%d item(s) have been removed from MediaStore.
This feature is still under development so be careful. If you encounter any bug report it immediately to be fixed and moved from experimental stage.
Check and decide what invalid media files you want to clean.
Set this app as the system assistant app & use it by long-pressing the home button or swiping from the bottom corners.
Your clipboard is under the protection!
Will rerun scan each time something is found with a limit of ten scans.
Are you sure? Files deleted cannot be restored after clean process.
Analyze what files you can clean without deleting then.
Help me by clicking here. Is free.
Delete temp, log, logs, & other useless files & folders.

Files left over from uninstalled/removed apps.
Detect folders that should be protected automatically.
No dialog menu when clicking clean button.
Click here to add files/folders you want to be excluded at next scan.
A simple channel with romanian cartoons.
A little artist in a big world.
Clipboard Cleaner is here to prevent your clipboard from being used casually, secure your copied password & defend your privacy!
Create a service running in the background. Reset your clipboard if it\'s changed or notify you. This solution is efficient but battery-draining.
Report me if the clipboard\'s changed.
Create widgets on your home screen. Click them to reset clipboard or see clipboard content. \n\nYou can find them in the widget list.
Create an app shortcut on your home screen. Click them to reset clipboard or see clipboard content.
Permission granted! Please create shortcuts now.
Clean the clipboard after %s (click here to edit).
If enabled, will only clean the content that includes keywords.
Add a quick setting tile to your notification bar. Click them to reset clipboard or see clipboard content. \n\nYou can find them in the quick settings edit screen.
Warning!!! This filter delete every file type is in your device like documents, photos, videos, folders & more! I\'m not responsible for anything, use at your own risk.
Click here to clean your device!
Click here to add your words.
Click here to remove your words.

Start scan and choose invalid media files you want to remove.

Steps:
1. Click "Start scan!" button and wait for finishing scanning.
2. Choose actually invalid media files and click "Clean." button.
3. Done! You can go now XD
